definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Brain scientists call this process neuro-plasticity.
sentences.chinese: 腦科學家給這個過程叫神經可塑性。

sentences.english: Neuronal plasticity or synaptic plasticity is maximal during brain development and still exists in adult brain.
sentences.chinese: 腦發育過程中其可塑性最強，成年腦仍具有可塑性。

sentences.english: Neuronal plasticity or synaptic plasticity is maximal during brain development and still exists in adult brain.
sentences.chinese: 腦發育過程中其可塑性最強，成年腦仍具有可塑性。

sentences.english: After nerve injury, the nerve function can be compensated by axonal plasticity .
sentences.chinese: 腦外傷後神經損傷可通過軸突的可塑性來代償其功能。

sentences.english: Every time we recall a long-term memory, it becomes malleable.
sentences.chinese: 每當我們回憶起一段長期記憶，它都是具有可塑性的。

sentences.english: Other proof of the plasticity of carrot was also forthcoming.
sentences.chinese: 胡羅卜可塑性的其他證明也垂手可得。

sentences.english: The growth behavior of Zoysia japonica showed strong plasticity and foraging trait.
sentences.chinese: 結縷草的生長行爲表現出很強的可塑性和覓養特性。

sentences.english: Translucency and malleability properties are also good.
sentences.chinese: 半透明和可塑性性能也很好。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a method for improving the pug plasticity in the production process of a bone china.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及骨質瓷生產工藝中提高泥料可塑性的方法。

sentences.english: Intelligent people ratchet up brainpower through their brain’s natural plasticity ...
sentences.chinese: 聰明的人通過他們大腦的自我可塑性來加強智能培養。

sentences.english: We’re much more comfortable with our bodies as malleable.
sentences.chinese: 我們對於身體具可塑性感到安心。

sentences.english: Life is largely clumped into parcels and only mildly plastic.
sentences.chinese: 生命在很大程度上是聚集成羣的，只略具可塑性。

sentences.english: Scientific Realism and the Plasticity of Mind.
sentences.chinese: 科學實在論與心靈的可塑性。

sentences.english: It is malleable and has a white and lustrous appearance.
sentences.chinese: 這是可塑性，有一個白色，有光澤的外觀。
然而可塑性確實存在極限。

sentences.english: The second constructive system is what gives meaning to the general modulation of the whole piece.
sentences.chinese: 可塑性系統使整個建築體塊有了實質性的意義。

definition: (personal) warmth/approachability/accessibility/(in a product) user friendliness/(chemistry) affinity
training in the basic skills/knowledge of the fundamentals
attractiveness index (rating of how good-looking sb is)
